A Psalm<S>4210</S> of David<S>1732</S>. I will sing<S>7891</S> of mercy<S>2617</S> and judgment<S>4941</S>: unto thee, O LORD<S>3068</S>, will I sing<S>2167</S>.
I will behave myself wisely<S>7919</S> in a perfect<S>8549</S> way<S>1870</S>. O when wilt thou come<S>935</S> unto me? I will walk<S>1980</S> within<S>7130</S> my house<S>1004</S> with a perfect<S>8537</S> heart<S>3824</S>.
I will set<S>7896</S> no wicked<S>1100</S> thing<S>1697</S> before mine eyes<S>5869</S>: I hate<S>8130</S> the work<S>6213</S> of them that turn aside<S>7750</S>; it shall not cleave<S>1692</S> to me. <sup>wicked: Heb. thing of Belial</sup>
A froward<S>6141</S> heart<S>3824</S> shall depart<S>5493</S> from me: I will not know<S>3045</S> a wicked<S>7451</S> person.
Whoso privily<S>5643</S> slandereth<S>3960</S> <S>3960</S> his neighbour<S>7453</S>, him will I cut off<S>6789</S>: him that hath an high<S>1362</S> look<S>5869</S> and a proud<S>7342</S> heart<S>3824</S> will not I suffer<S>3201</S>.
Mine eyes<S>5869</S> shall be upon the faithful<S>539</S> of the land<S>776</S>, that they may dwell<S>3427</S> with me: he that walketh<S>1980</S> in a perfect<S>8549</S> way<S>1870</S>, he shall serve<S>8334</S> me. <sup>in a: or, perfect in the way</sup>
He that worketh<S>6213</S> deceit<S>7423</S> shall not dwell<S>3427</S> within<S>7130</S> my house<S>1004</S>: he that telleth<S>1696</S> lies<S>8267</S> shall not tarry<S>3559</S> in my sight<S>5869</S>. <sup>shall not tarry: Heb. shall not be established</sup>
I will early<S>1242</S> destroy<S>6789</S> all the wicked<S>7563</S> of the land<S>776</S>; that I may cut off<S>3772</S> all wicked<S>205</S> doers<S>6466</S> from the city<S>5892</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>.
